original: 正史記載應作「大橋」，橋國老之女，孫策妻，周瑜妻小喬胞姐，並稱「二喬」，為三國時代絕世美女之一。孫策臨終前與大喬訣別，也叮囑大喬需與其妹囑咐周瑜盡心輔佐孫權。演義中諸葛亮為促成抗曹聯軍，故意將曹植的銅雀台賦中「連二橋於東西兮，若長空之蝃蝀」篡改為「攬二喬於東南兮，樂朝夕之與共」，妄指曹操之所以南下，是為把江東二喬納入後宮，以此激怒周瑜。
text: The official history records should be 'Bridge', the daughter of the old Qiao, Sun Ce's wife, Zhou Yu's wife and Xiao Qiao's sister, also known as 'Two Qiao', is one of the peerless beauties of the Three Kingdoms era. Sun Ce bid farewell to Da Qiao before his death, and also urged Da Qiao to ask Zhou Yu to assist Sun Quan with his sister. In the novel, Zhuge Liang deliberately changed Cao Zhi’s bronze bird poem 'Lian two bridges in the east and west, if the sky is the worm' to 'Let the two Qiao in the southeast, enjoy the commonwealth' in the drama It was pointed out that the reason why Cao Cao went south was to bring Jiangdong Er Qiao into the harem, thus angering Zhou Yu.
